snippet: Examining earthquakes in the Barnett Shale from November 2009 to September 2011, a researcher identifies nearly eight times more quakes than had been reported, with the epicenters within two miles of drilling wells.
abstract: Examining earthquakes in the Barnett Shale from November 2009 to September 2011, a researcher identifies nearly eight times more quakes than had been reported, with the epicenters within two miles of drilling wells.

headline.main: Near Injection Wells, Many Quakes Go Unfelt

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Academies of the United States
